author: Ben Kew
title: Kremlin Scolds Moscow After Anti-Coronavirus Measures Trigger Large Crowds
description: Measures taken in Moscow, Russia, to control residents' travel amid the Chinese coronavirus pandemic sparked city-wide chaos on Wednesday, prompting concern that the virus may now spread even further.
content:
Measures taken in Moscow, Russia, to control residents’ travel amid the Chinese coronavirus pandemic sparked city-wide chaos on Wednesday, prompting concern that the virus may now spread even further.
